title: Strategies for Utilizing Virtual Platforms in Remote Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Adaptation to post-COVID-19 non-face-to-face education environments, requiring effective science learning strategies using digital platforms. Application of practical teaching methods in blended classrooms utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can perform science experiment simulation tasks with over 90% accuracy using a virtual platform interface.
Learners can write and improve scientific concept explanations based on peer feedback in online discussion forums.
Learners can implement data visualization of experimental results with over 80% completeness using built-in analytical tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
